{{also|eintritt}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{m|de|eintreten}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈaɪ̯ntrɪt/|[ˈʔäɪ̯ntʁɪt]}} * {{audio|de|De-Eintritt.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Eintritts|gen2=Eintrittes|Eintritte}} # {{lb|de|chiefly|uncountable}} [[occurring]]; [[occurrence]] {{gloss|the fact that something happens}} # {{lb|de|chiefly|uncountable}} [[joining]]; [[enlistment]] {{gloss|becoming a member, e.g. of a club}} # {{lb|de|chiefly|uncountable}} [[entrance]], [[access]] {{gloss|right to go in, also the fee thereof}} # {{lb|de|countable|rather|_|rare}} [[entry]], [[entrance]] {{gloss|door or area where one enters}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|occurrence}} {{l|de|Eintreten}} * {{sense|joining}} {{l|de|Beitritt}}; {{l|de|Eintreten}} * {{sense|right to go in}} {{l|de|Einlass}}; {{l|de|Zugang}}; {{l|de|Zutritt}} * {{sense|entry}} {{l|de|Eingang}}; {{l|de|Einlass}}; {{l|de|Zugang}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Eintrittskarte}} * {{l|de|Eintrittspreis}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
